attributes.action: We The British Peoples Call For A General Election Before The Conservative Coalition  Ruin This Country Totally For Anyone Who Is Not A Millionaire
attributes.additional_details: We the British peoples of many Creeds, Colours, Religions, Abilitys (disabled and non-disabled) and Classes call apon this government to call a re election due to the fact that they did not win an election in the first place and are sending the United Kingdom into a downward spiral that will only benefit the rich and will cause millions of familys and children to starve and possibly die to line the pockets of bankers and crooked politicians.
